jobDescription: Are you looking for a rewarding position as an RN Registered Nurse? White Glove Placement, Inc. is currently seeking RN Registered Nurses for Psychiatric positions.Join our team of happy Registered Nurses!!At White Glove we are dedicated to make your Psychiatric RN Registered Nurse career rewarding! If you are an experience RN Registered Nurse, we would like to hear from you.As a Psychiatric Registered Nurse with White Glove you will receive:The pay YOU deserveDirect Deposit – for your convenienceReferral Bonuses for referring your nurse friends24 Hour support by our caring teamAnd more!Requirements for RN Registered Nurse - Psychiatric Nurse:NYS RN LicenseCurrent or Recent experience as a Registered Nurse in Psychiatry[Related Keywords: rn, registered nurse, psych, psychiatry, psychiatric, healthcare, health care]
